title: Can I use my phone as a USB flash drive?
answer:
Yes. You can connect your phone to a computer in USB flash drive mode using a USB cable and view content in the microSD card, but not content in your phone's internal storage.



- Media Device (MTP): MTP stands for Media Transfer Protocol. In this mode, you can synchronize media files between your phone and the computer that supports MTP.

- USB flsh drive : In this mode, you can connect your phone to a computer using a USB cable to manage content in the microSD card, such as copying and deleting the content.


When your phone is connected to a Mac in MTP mode, you can manage files on your phone, but the dial-up connection function on Mac is uavailable.
